name: Saris Solo 1-Bike Trunk Rack
description: No one can slow you down when you ride alone. Whether you are setting out for a little solo bicycle therapy, or meeting up for a group ride, the Solo is an uncomplicated way to get your bike from A-to-B.No assembly required.Strong injection-moulded 1-piece design.Ultralight design at less than 1kg.Built with 100% recyclable, non-rusting materials.Articulated rubber feet protect the finish on your vehicle (but make sure you put them on a clean surface).Vinyl-coated hooks and cam-buckle equipped straps are quick and easy to secure.Fits most vehicles from sedans to minivans, and cars with spoilers.Be careful to make sure the rack doesn’t obscure your rear licence plate.
